revision.text:
{{Infobox dungeon |name = Rock Tunnel |image = [[File:Rock Tunnel.png|thumb]] |caption = An overhead map of the Rock Tunnel. |tokens = 500 |location = North of Lavender Town, or east of Cerulean City. }} '''Rock Tunnel''' is a [[Dungeons|dungeon]] in [[Kanto]]. It has 25 tiles arranged in a 5x5 square, including 5 chest tiles, 13 non-boss encounter tiles, and 1 boss encounter tile. Wild Encounters have 4,117 HP. == Encounter Tables == ===Wild Encounters=== {| class="wikitable" |- ! Wild Pokémon !! colspan=2|Trainers |- ! Encounter !! Trainer !!
